Trigger.name: m&m Healing Addon Succor
Trigger.script:
if ofn then ofn.succoring = matches[2] end
if not mmheal.capture then return end
local capture = mmheal.succorstart() if not capture then setTriggerStayOpen("m&m Healing Addon Succor", 0) end

regexCodeList.string: afflicted with the curse of the Aeon.
suffering from a bad bout of dysentery.
suffering from a sliced open gut.
surrounded by the aura of justice.
punctured in the etheric substance of your aura.
suffering a chest that has been opened up.
confounded by circuitous logic in a debate.
trapped by a loophole in a debate.
under the curse of the dark moon.
afflicted with the darkseed implanted beneath the skin.
twitching in the face due to a gash.
immobile due to a severed spine.
having difficulty breathing due to a severed phrenic nerve.
suffering from the effects of blank note.
beset by dazzling rainbow coloured patterns.
infected with a parasite of the dreaming.
suffering under a warped aura of infirmity.
under the influence of a love potion.
suffering from a severed artery in the left arm.
suffering from a severed artery in the left leg.
suffering from a severed artery in the right arm.
suffering from a severed artery in the right leg.
afflicted with sunburnt, red skin (first degree burns).

afflicted with deeply charred flesh and muscles (fourth degree burns).
afflicted by a crippled left arm.
afflicted by a crippled right arm.

afflicted by a crippled right leg.

suffering from a pierced left leg.
suffering from a collapsed left arm nerve.
suffering from a collapsed right arm nerve.
inflicted with a cracked right elbow.
inflicted with a cracked left kneecap.
inflicted with a cracked right kneecap.
inflicted with a cracked left elbow.
suffering from a sliced tendon in the left leg.
suffering from a sliced tendon in the right leg.
afflicted with a blood clot in the right hip.
afflicted with a blood clot in the left hip.
afflicted with a blood clot in the right shoulder.
afflicted with a blood clot in the left shoulder.
suffering from a lacerated left arm.
suffering from a lacerated right arm.
suffering from a lacerated left leg.
suffering from a lacerated right leg.
suffering from a fractured left arm.
suffering from a fractured right arm.
inflicted with a sliced left bicep.
inflicted with a sliced left thigh.
inflicted with a sliced right bicep.
inflicted with a sliced right thigh.
marked with the aura of a heretic.
marked with the aura of an infidel.
clamped on the left arm by a hound's jaws.
clamped on the right arm by a hound's jaws.
bewitched by hypnotic patterns of lights.
limping on a crushed left foot.
limping on a crushed right foot.
marked by a small stain on the throat.
marked by a murky blotch on the throat.
marked by a dark mark on the throat.

marked by a black miasma on the throat.
a host to a phantom thoughtstealer.
a host to a phantom sightstealer.
suffering from a slight case of temporary insanity.
suffering from a moderate case of temporary insanity.
suffering from a major case of temporary insanity.
suffering from a massive case of temporary insanity.
under the gaze of an oracle.

Trigger.name: Bleeding
Trigger.script: if tonumber(multimatches[2][2]) > 50 then mmheal.succor("bleeding", tonumber(multimatches[2][2])) end

regexCodeList.string: limping with a shattered right ankle.
limping with a shattered left ankle.
suffering from a dislocated left arm.
suffering from a dislocated right arm.
suffering from a dislocated left leg.
suffering from a dislocated right leg.
right leg lashed in thorny vines.
left leg lashed in thorny vines.
right arm lashed in thorny vines.
left arm lashed in thorny vines.

Alias.name: Radiate an aura for an aff
Alias.script:
local aff = matches[2] local p = matches[3]
local aura = mmheal.getaura(aff) if not aura then mm.echof("No aura for %s the aff is known.", aff) return end
send("radiate "..aura, false)
if p then send("aurashift "..aura.." "..p, false) end

Script.name: Healing
Script.script:
local t, raw = {}, { sensory = {"slickness", "ablaze", "chills", "firstdegreeburn", "seconddegreeburn", "thirddegreeburn", "fourthdegreeburn", "sensitivity", "blindness", "deafness"}, fractures = {"concussion", "fracturedleftarm", "fracturedrightarm", "fracturedskull", "brokenjaw", "brokenrightwrist", "brokenleftwrist", "brokenchest", "brokennose", "crushedrightfoot", "crushedleftfoot", "crushedwindpipe", "snappedrib"}, neurosis = {"epilepsy", "anorexia", "confusion", "clumsiness", "minorinsanity", "moderateinsanity", "majorinsanity", "massiveinsanity"}, choleric = {"vomiting", "asthma", "pox", "sickening", "dysentery", "scabies", "paralysis"}, sanguine = {"haemophilia", "relapsing", "onevessels", "twovessels", "threevessels", "fourvessels", "thirteenplusvessels", "clotleftshoulder", "clotrightshoulder", "clotleftleg", "clotrightleg"}, phlegmatic = {"aeon", "paralysis", "rigormortis", "disloyalty", "pacifism", "minortimewarp", "moderatetimewarp", "majortimewarp", "massivetimewarp", "transfixed"}, auric = {"aeon", "achromaticaura", "healthleech", "powerspikes", "manabarbs", "egovice", "powersap", "illuminated"}, mania = {"stupidity", "recklessness", "hallucinations", "addiction", "paranoia", "asthma", "insomnia" }, regenerate = {{burstorgans = "gut"}, {missingrightleg = "legs"}, {missingleftarm = "arms"}, {missingleftleg = "legs"}, {missingrightarm = "arms"}, {eyepeckleft = "head"}, {eyepeckright = "head"}, {mangledleftleg = "legs"}, {mangledleftarm = "arms"}, {mangledrightarm = "arms"}, {mangledrightleg = "legs"}, {crushedchest = "chest"}, {collapsedrightnerve = "arms"}, {collapsedlungs = "chest"}, {collapsedleftnerve = "arms"}, {crackedleftelbow = "arms"}, {crackedrightelbow = "arms"}, {crackedrightkneecap = "legs"}, {crackedleftkneecap = "legs"}, {disembowel = "gut"}, {chestpain = "chest"}, {rupturedstomach = "gut"}, {severedspine = "chest"}, {tendonright = "legs"}, {tendonleft = "legs"}, {concussion = "head"}, {damagedhead = "head"}, {shatteredleftankle = "legs"}, {shatteredrightankle = "legs"}, {shatteredjaw = "head"}} }
for aura, afft in pairs(raw) do for _, aff in pairs(afft) do if type(aff) == "string" then t[aff] = aura elseif type(aff) == "table" then t[next(aff)] = {aura = aura, side = select(2, next(aff))} end
end end
function mmheal.getaura(aff) return t[aff] end
function mmheal.capturef() if mmheal.capture then killTimer(mmheal.capture) end
mmheal.capture = tempTimer(getNetworkLatency() + 3, [[mmheal.capture = nil]]) end
function mmheal.succorstart() if not mmheal.name then return end if not string.find(matches[2]:lower(), mmheal.name:lower(), 1, true) then return false end mmheal.target = matches[2] mmheal.affs = {} return true end
function mmheal.succorfinished(otheraffslist, othername)
if (not mmheal.name and not othername) or ((not next(otheraffslist or mmheal.affs)) or mmheal.doingstuff) or mm.affl.paralysis then raiseEvent("m&m Healing done curing") return end
local function heal(aff) send(string.format("%s %s %s%s", (mmheal.farhealing and "farcure" or "cure"), othername or mmheal.target, (type(t[aff]) == "string" and t[aff] or t[aff].aura), (type(t[aff]) == "string" and "" or (" ".. t[aff].side)) )) mm.bals.equilibrium = false; mm.doaddfree((mmheal.farhealing and "fc " or "cre ") .. (othername or mmheal.target)) mmheal.doingstuff = tempTimer(1, [[mmheal.doingstuff = nil]])
end
local emergencyheals = {"aeon", "anorexia", "slickness", "slickness", "crushedwindpipe", "slitthroat", "throatlock", "ectoplasm"} local inters = table.n_intersection(otheraffslist or mmheal.affs, emergencyheals) if inters[1] then echo"\n" mm.echof("%s has such important affs: %s", othername or mmheal.target, (function () local s = "" for _, aff in ipairs(t) do s = string.format("<72,61,139:255,215,0>%s%s<:0,0,0>, ", aff, mm.getDefaultColor()) end return s:sub(1, -2) end)()) end
echo"\n" mm.echof("%s has: %s", othername or mmheal.target, table.concat(otheraffslist or mmheal.affs, ", "))
--[[ if table.contains((otheraffslist or mmheal.affs), "bleeding") and mmheal.bleedamount and mmheal.bleedamount >= 500 and t.bleeding then heal("bleeding") return end]]
do local t = otheraffslist or mmheal.affs if t.crippledleftleg and t.crippledrightleg and t.crippledrightarm and t.crippledleftarm then inters.crippledleftleg = true end end
-- cure very important affs firstly for _, aff in ipairs(inters) do if (table.contains((otheraffslist or mmheal.affs), aff)) and t[aff] then mm.echof("Trying to get <255,0,9:255,215,0>%s%s<:0,0,0> off %s", aff, mm.getDefaultColor(), (othername or mmheal.target)) heal(aff) return end end
for _, aff in ipairs(otheraffslist or mmheal.affs) do if t[aff] and aff ~= "bleeding" then heal(aff) return true end end
if (table.contains((otheraffslist or mmheal.affs), "bleeding")) and t.bleeding then heal("bleeding") return end
if mmheal.name then mm.echof("%s is cured now.", mmheal.name) mmheal.name, mmheal.farhealing = nil raiseEvent("m&m Healing done curing") return false end end
function mmheal.cure(whom) send("succor "..whom, false) mmheal.farhealing = false mmheal.capturef() mmheal.name = whom end
function mmheal.farcure(whom) send("succor "..whom, false) mmheal.farhealing = true mmheal.capturef() mmheal.name = whom end
function mmheal.stop() if mmheal.name then mm.echof("Stopped healing %s.", mmheal.name) else mm.echof("Wasn't healing anybody.") end mmheal.name, mmheal.farhealing = nil mm.undoallfree(false) end
function mmheal.succor(aff, bleedamount, attractedto) assert(aff) if bleedamount and tonumber(bleedamount) < 200 then return end
mmheal.affs[#mmheal.affs+1] = aff mmheal.bleedamount = bleedamount end
